document.full_text: a group of hackers angered by a pbs documentary about wikileaks has posted a fake news story on the website of the public broadcaster pbs claiming that dead rapper tupac shakur was alive and well.
document.title: group hacks tv website in wikileaks protest
lines_and_colors: a group of hackers angered by a pbs documentary about wikileaks has posted a fake news story on the website of the public broadcaster pbs claiming that dead rapper tupac shakur was alive and well.
